section.heading: Definitions.
section.text: For the purposes of this subchapter, the term:

para.text: "Motor vehicle" shall have the same meaning as provided in § 50-1301.02(4).
"Non-motorized user" means an individual using a skateboard, non-motorized scooter, Segway, tricycle, and other similar non-powered transportation devices.
"Pedestrian" shall have the same meaning as provided in 18 DCMR § 9901.1.
"Public highway" shall have the same meaning as provided in § 50-1301.02(9).
